title: Boomerang
desc:
Post 1313
- The next player draws a card.
- On your next turn, the next player for the next player draws a card.
- On your next, next turn, the next player for the next next player draws a card.
- This goes on until it goes back to you, in which you either have a 30% chance to catch it, or for it to go back around on another trip. Every time you donâ€™t catch it, the chance goes up by 10%.
